message: Can I order a pepperoni pizza
Yes, you can order a pepperoni pizza. It is priced at AED 43.0. Would you like to place an order for this item? Please respond with 'yes' to confirm or 'no' to cancel.

To confirm your order for the pepperoni pizza, I'll need a few more details from you. Please provide:

1. Your NYU ID (8 digits)
2. Your building number (e.g., A1A, A1B, A1C, A2A, A2B, A2C, A3, A4, A5A, A5B, A5C, A6A, A6B, A6C)
3. Your phone number (UAE format)
4. Do you have any special requests for your order? (like extra toppings, dietary restrictions, etc.)

Once I have all of this information, I can proceed with your order.
My NYU ID is 12345678, my building number is A2A, my phone number is +971 13904223, and I don't have any special requests

Great! I found the pepperoni pizza on our menu for AED 43.0. Your provided NYU ID seems to be invalid because it is not an 8-digit number. Please provide your NYU ID in the correct format, and I'll continue with your order. Also, please remember that your building number should be one of: A1A, A1B, A1C, A2A, A2B, A2C, A3, A4, A5A, A5B, A5C, A6A, A6B, A6C.

Provided Information:
- Item: pepperoni pizza
- Special Request: none (since you didn't provide any)

Missing Information:
- NYU ID (must be 8 digits)
- Building (must be one of: A1A, A1B, A1C, A2A, A2B, A2C, A3, A4, A5A, A5B, A5C, A6A, A6B, A6C)
- Phone number

I'm glad you found something to your liking! The pepperoni pizza is available on our menu for AED 43.0. To proceed with your order, please provide me with the necessary details:

3. Your phone number (UAE format)
4. Do you have any special requests for your order? (like extra toppings, dietary restrictions, etc.)

Once I have all of this information, I can proceed with your order.
